categoryKeys.name: Banking & Payments
categoryKeys.guidance: Account access for migrants; fees; mobile wallets.

categoryKeys.name: Cost of Living (Optional)
categoryKeys.guidance: Housing, groceries, transit vs. benchmark city.

categoryKeys.name: Economic System
categoryKeys.guidance: Market characteristics; social safety nets.

categoryKeys.name: Expected Tax Rate (Our Family)
categoryKeys.guidance: Income bands; social contributions; credits.

categoryKeys.name: How Taxes Are Handled
categoryKeys.guidance: Filing process; PAYE; joint vs. individual.

categoryKeys.name: Retirement (Citizens)
categoryKeys.guidance: State/occupational pensions for citizens; private pillars.

categoryKeys.name: Retirement (Visa Holders)
categoryKeys.guidance: Eligibility for temporary/permanent residents; portability.

categoryKeys.name: Femininity Norms
categoryKeys.guidance: Appearance, behavior expectations; safety.

categoryKeys.name: Gender Fluidity
categoryKeys.guidance: Social visibility; non-binary recognition.

categoryKeys.guidance: Legal protections; workplace equality; parental leave.

categoryKeys.name: Gender Roles
categoryKeys.guidance: Traditional vs. egalitarian norms.

categoryKeys.name: Masculinity Norms
categoryKeys.guidance: Work, emotion, caregiving expectations.

categoryKeys.name: Authoritarian Backsliding Risk
categoryKeys.guidance: Media freedom; judiciary independence.

categoryKeys.name: Perceived Corruption
categoryKeys.guidance: CPI rank; enforcement; transparency.

categoryKeys.name: Political System
categoryKeys.guidance: Structure; party dynamics; electoral fairness.

categoryKeys.name: Propaganda Messaging
categoryKeys.guidance: Common themes; impact on daily life.

categoryKeys.name: Propaganda Prevalence
categoryKeys.guidance: State/private media narratives; disinfo exposure.

categoryKeys.name: Religion in Politics
categoryKeys.guidance: Secularism; clerical influence.

categoryKeys.name: Social Policies
categoryKeys.guidance: Reproductive rights; LGBTQ+ rights; antidiscrimination.

categoryKeys.name: Stability
categoryKeys.guidance: Political and economic stability; protest risk.

categoryKeys.name: State Ideology
categoryKeys.guidance: Marxism/Socialism/Capitalism in practice and rhetoric.

categoryKeys.name: State of Capitalism
categoryKeys.guidance: Market competition; monopolies; SME friendliness.

categoryKeys.name: Trust in Government
categoryKeys.guidance: Surveys; participation; service reliability.

categoryKeys.name: Type of Corruption
categoryKeys.guidance: Petty vs. grand; sectors affected.

categoryKeys.name: Workers' Rights
categoryKeys.guidance: Unions, protections, termination norms, non-competes.

categoryKeys.name: Air Quality
categoryKeys.guidance: PM2.5 annual average; seasonal spikes.

categoryKeys.name: Atheism
categoryKeys.guidance: Prevalence; social acceptance; religious diversity.

categoryKeys.name: Beach Life
categoryKeys.guidance: Access, cleanliness, crowding, amenities, safety.

categoryKeys.name: Boardgaming & Tabletop
categoryKeys.guidance: FLGS density; clubs; conventions; cafes.

categoryKeys.name: Body Image & Fitness Pressure
categoryKeys.guidance: Reviews cultural expectations around physique, diet, and exercise, and how judgmental the environment feels.

categoryKeys.name: Broader Job Market Resilience
categoryKeys.guidance: Evaluates how diversified and stable the regional economy is, and how well it weathers recessions or industry shocks.

categoryKeys.name: Cancer Incidence
categoryKeys.guidance: Tracks cancer incidence trends, screening access, and environmental contributors that affect long-term family planning.

categoryKeys.name: Carceral Conditions & Prison Labor
categoryKeys.guidance: Examines prison conditions, treatment of incarcerated people, and reliance on prison labor in the justice system.

categoryKeys.name: Child-Friendliness of Cities
categoryKeys.guidance: Playgrounds, parks, cafes; breastfeeding norms.

categoryKeys.name: Childcare Support (Citizens)
categoryKeys.guidance: Subsidies/vouchers/leave for citizens; eligibility and amounts.

categoryKeys.name: Childcare Support (Visa Holders)
categoryKeys.guidance: Access for non-citizens; waiting periods; documentation hurdles.

categoryKeys.name: Common Hobbies
categoryKeys.guidance: Popular pastimes; outdoor/indoor balance.

categoryKeys.name: Community Health Consciousness
categoryKeys.guidance: Assesses how strongly locals emphasize preventive health, fitness, and wellness resources accessible to families.

categoryKeys.name: Community Living Opportunities
categoryKeys.guidance: Reviews access to co-housing, eco-villages, intentional communities, and supportive shared living models for families.

categoryKeys.name: Community Vibes
categoryKeys.guidance: Friendliness to newcomers; social clubs; expat density.

categoryKeys.name: Controlled Substance Policies
categoryKeys.guidance: Looks at how the jurisdiction regulates recreational substances, harm reduction, and proportional penalties.

categoryKeys.name: Depression Prevalence
categoryKeys.guidance: Considers mental health statistics, stigma, and support systems addressing depression across the community.

categoryKeys.name: Depth-Seeking Social Norms
categoryKeys.guidance: Reflects how quickly relationships move beyond small talk into meaningful friendship and mutual support.

categoryKeys.name: Drug Enforcement Climate
categoryKeys.guidance: Captures how policing, courts, and community norms handle drug-related activity in practice.

categoryKeys.name: Environment
categoryKeys.guidance: Overall environmental quality; protected areas; biodiversity.

categoryKeys.name: Fall Temperature Range (C/F)
categoryKeys.guidance: Typical min–max; onset of rains/winds; daylight changes.

categoryKeys.name: Family Life
categoryKeys.guidance: Family-friendly amenities; school schedules; work-family balance.

categoryKeys.name: Family Policy (Citizens)
categoryKeys.guidance: Parental leave, child benefits, tax credits for citizens.

categoryKeys.name: Family Policy (Visa Holders)
categoryKeys.guidance: Which benefits extend to temporary residents; waiting periods.

categoryKeys.name: Fashion & Style Expectations
categoryKeys.guidance: Considers how much locals value trendiness, designer labels, and sartorial polish across daily life.

categoryKeys.name: Fashion Trends (Female)
categoryKeys.guidance: Prevailing attractive styles; modesty norms; body positivity; swimwear.

categoryKeys.name: Fashion Trends (Male)
categoryKeys.guidance: Prevailing attractive styles; modesty norms; body positivity; swimwear.

categoryKeys.name: Firearm Laws & Ownership Culture
categoryKeys.guidance: Evaluates gun prevalence, regulation, and community attitudes toward firearms impacting perceived safety.

categoryKeys.name: Flirting Boundaries & Consent Culture
categoryKeys.guidance: Analyzes norms around flirting, consent education, and respect for boundaries in social and nightlife settings.

categoryKeys.name: Fresh & International Cuisine Access
categoryKeys.guidance: Evaluates availability of fresh produce, farmers markets, and diverse international dining that aligns with the family's palate.

categoryKeys.name: Friendliness & Neighborliness Index
categoryKeys.guidance: Summarizes day-to-day warmth, neighborly help, and whether newcomers can easily build casual support networks.

categoryKeys.name: Gendered Flirting Expectations
categoryKeys.guidance: Looks at how rigid gender roles shape dating and social interactions, and whether nontraditional dynamics are accepted.

categoryKeys.name: Global Warming Risk
categoryKeys.guidance: Sea-level, heatwaves, drought, wildfire, flood risk.

categoryKeys.name: Grooming & Beauty Investment
categoryKeys.guidance: Examines how much time and money locals spend on appearance, and the pressure for the family to match those standards.

categoryKeys.name: Group & Multi-Partner Relationship Attitudes
categoryKeys.guidance: Measures openness toward triads, quads, and intentional multi-partner households beyond traditional couples.

categoryKeys.name: Higher Education Access (Citizens)
categoryKeys.guidance: Tuition, financial aid, admission competitiveness for citizens.

categoryKeys.name: Higher Education Access (Visa Holders)
categoryKeys.guidance: Eligibility, international tuition, scholarships for non-citizens.

categoryKeys.name: Housing Situation
categoryKeys.guidance: Availability; renting norms; tenant protections; prices.

categoryKeys.name: Immigrant Sentiment – General
categoryKeys.guidance: Captures public attitudes toward immigrants overall, including policy tone, media narratives, and day-to-day acceptance.

categoryKeys.name: Immigrant Sentiment – White Migrants
categoryKeys.guidance: Examines how white immigrants specifically are received, including assumptions of privilege or outsider status.

categoryKeys.name: K-12 Education Access (Citizens)
categoryKeys.guidance: Enrollment ease; zoning; costs; secular options.

categoryKeys.name: K-12 Education Access (Visa Holders)
categoryKeys.guidance: Eligibility by status; fees; language support; secular options.

categoryKeys.name: LGBTQ+ Attitudes
categoryKeys.guidance: Social acceptance; legal protections (see Rights below).

categoryKeys.name: Language & English Ubiquity
categoryKeys.guidance: English proficiency; necessity of local language.

categoryKeys.name: Marxism (Societal Attitudes)
categoryKeys.guidance: Public discourse; historical context.

categoryKeys.name: Mass Violence Incidence
categoryKeys.guidance: Rates the frequency of mass shootings, terror attacks, and large-scale violent incidents impacting sense of safety.

categoryKeys.name: Meetups & Communities
categoryKeys.guidance: Tech, game dev, parenting, LGBTQ+, poly groups.

categoryKeys.name: Monogamy vs. Non-Monogamy Acceptance
categoryKeys.guidance: Evaluates cultural comfort with polyamory, open relationships, and families choosing non-monogamous structures.

categoryKeys.name: Moral, Honesty & Openness Expectations
categoryKeys.guidance: Explores cultural norms around candor, sharing personal truths, and how communities respond to vulnerability or mistakes.

categoryKeys.name: Natural Beauty
categoryKeys.guidance: Landscapes, parks, hiking, diving; ease of access.

categoryKeys.name: Natural Disasters
categoryKeys.guidance: Earthquake/volcano/hurricane exposure; building codes.

categoryKeys.name: Nature Access
categoryKeys.guidance: Day-trip options; weekend getaways.

categoryKeys.name: Nightlife & Music
categoryKeys.guidance: Venues; noise norms; live scenes.

categoryKeys.name: Nightlife Culture
categoryKeys.guidance: Evening norms; venues; safety; opening hours; family-friendliness.

categoryKeys.name: Obesity Rate
categoryKeys.guidance: Reviews obesity prevalence and whether health systems, culture, and infrastructure mitigate the risks.

categoryKeys.name: Parenting Expectations
categoryKeys.guidance: Discipline norms; extracurricular load; autonomy.

categoryKeys.name: Personal Boundary & Bubble Norms
categoryKeys.guidance: Assesses expectations for physical space, touch, and how people signal comfort zones in social settings.

categoryKeys.name: Personal Space & Touch Norms
categoryKeys.guidance: Focuses on how cultures handle greetings, casual touch, and crowding—critical for neurodiversity comfort.

categoryKeys.name: Pleasant Weather Windows
categoryKeys.guidance: Measures how many months deliver comfortable temperatures, humidity, and precipitation so the family can enjoy outdoor life.

categoryKeys.name: Polyamory
categoryKeys.guidance: Social acceptance; legal risks; custody implications.

categoryKeys.name: Pre-K / Early Childcare Landscape
categoryKeys.guidance: What care looks like before public school: availability, hours, costs.

categoryKeys.name: Private Education
categoryKeys.guidance: Availability; typical costs; secular vs denominational; admissions.

categoryKeys.name: Processed Food Saturation
categoryKeys.guidance: Measures prevalence of ultra-processed foods in stores, schools, and advertising versus whole food availability.

categoryKeys.name: Progressivism
categoryKeys.guidance: Social liberalism; civil liberties; inclusion.

categoryKeys.name: Promiscuity Attitudes
categoryKeys.guidance: Considers moral views on casual sex and whether people feel judged for having or discussing multiple partners.

categoryKeys.name: Quality of Life – Higher-Income Tier
categoryKeys.guidance: Evaluates whether affluent families enjoy frictionless services, luxury experiences, and wealth stewardship without social backlash.

categoryKeys.name: Quality of Life – Lower-Income Tier
categoryKeys.guidance: Assesses how supportive the city is for lower-income households: housing stability, public benefits, neighborhood safety, and mobility to improve circumstances.

categoryKeys.name: Quality of Life – Middle-Income Tier
categoryKeys.guidance: Looks at how comfortably a typical professional household can thrive: housing choice, disposable income, services, and work-life harmony.

categoryKeys.name: Safety & Crime
categoryKeys.guidance: Violent/property crime; hate crime risk; policing.

categoryKeys.name: Schooling Options
categoryKeys.guidance: Public vs. private; language tracks; international schools.

categoryKeys.name: Seasonal Beach Water Temp
categoryKeys.guidance: Monthly SST; comfortable swim months.

categoryKeys.name: Seasonal Extremes & Variability
categoryKeys.guidance: Captures how volatile and hazardous seasonal swings are, from temperature spikes to sudden storms, and how much they disrupt daily routines.

categoryKeys.name: Seasonal Sunlight Hours
categoryKeys.guidance: Evaluates daylight balance across the year and how much seasonal darkness or midnight sun affects mood, sleep, and routine.

categoryKeys.name: Seasonal Weather
categoryKeys.guidance: Temp/precip by season; humidity; daylight; storms.

categoryKeys.name: Sex (Attitudes)
categoryKeys.guidance: Public norms; sex education; media openness.

categoryKeys.name: Spacious Housing Benchmark (2k sq ft Rent)
categoryKeys.guidance: Tracks availability and cost of renting a roughly 2,000 sq ft family home in safe, convenient neighborhoods.

categoryKeys.name: Spring Temperature Range (C/F)
categoryKeys.guidance: Typical min–max daytime temps; note humidity and rain.

categoryKeys.name: Summer Temperature Range (C/F)
categoryKeys.guidance: Typical min–max; comment on humidity/heat index and nights.

categoryKeys.name: Surface Interaction Norms
categoryKeys.guidance: Describes expectations for casual social exchanges—small talk, customer service warmth, and day-to-day civility.

categoryKeys.name: View of Neighboring Countries
categoryKeys.guidance: How do they generally view their neighboring countries.

categoryKeys.name: View of Them by Neighboring Countries
categoryKeys.guidance: How do neighboring countries generally view them.

categoryKeys.name: View of self
categoryKeys.guidance: How do they generally view themselves.

categoryKeys.name: Walkability & Pedestrian Safety
categoryKeys.guidance: Evaluates sidewalk coverage, safe crossings, traffic calming, and how easily the family can rely on walking daily.

categoryKeys.name: What Is Intriguing
categoryKeys.guidance: Unique cultural draws; lifestyle perks.

categoryKeys.name: Winter Temperature Range (C/F)
categoryKeys.guidance: Typical min–max; snow/ice frequency; damp cold vs dry cold.

categoryKeys.name: Compliance & Risks
categoryKeys.guidance: Overstay penalties; tax residency triggers.

categoryKeys.name: Dual Citizenship Allowed
categoryKeys.guidance: Whether dual nationality is recognized; restrictions and exceptions.

categoryKeys.name: Family Members
categoryKeys.guidance: Work authorization for partner; dependents' schooling.

categoryKeys.name: General Considerations for Visa Holders
categoryKeys.guidance: Restrictions affecting schooling, benefits, banking, housing, travel.

categoryKeys.name: Path to Citizenship
categoryKeys.guidance: Timelines; residency years; language/civics tests.

categoryKeys.name: Residency Types & Durations
categoryKeys.guidance: TRP/PR; renewals; physical presence rules.

categoryKeys.name: Timelines & Costs
categoryKeys.guidance: Processing times; fees; legal assistance norms.

categoryKeys.name: Visa Paths
categoryKeys.guidance: Work, startup, family, student; eligibility and quotas.

categoryKeys.name: Welcoming of US Migrants
categoryKeys.guidance: Social attitudes; official stance.

categoryKeys.name: Modernity & Infrastructure
categoryKeys.guidance: Internet speed; payments; e-gov; grid.

categoryKeys.name: Child Care Support
categoryKeys.guidance: Subsidies; availability; quality; costs.

categoryKeys.name: Education
categoryKeys.guidance: K-12 quality; higher ed; language of instruction; costs.

categoryKeys.name: Family Policy (Common Family)
categoryKeys.guidance: Typical household structures; benefits.

categoryKeys.name: Healthcare (Citizens)
categoryKeys.guidance: Coverage model; quality; access times; costs.

categoryKeys.name: Healthcare (Visa Holders)
categoryKeys.guidance: Eligibility; insurance requirements; wait times.

categoryKeys.name: Public Transportation
categoryKeys.guidance: Coverage, frequency, reliability; car dependency.

categoryKeys.name: Game Dev Work Prospects
categoryKeys.guidance: Openings; indie vs. AAA; publishing ecosystem.

categoryKeys.name: Notable Game Development Communities
categoryKeys.guidance: Names, locations, size; value proposition.

categoryKeys.name: Notable Game Studios
categoryKeys.guidance: Names, locations, size; hiring climate.

categoryKeys.name: Opportunities for Video Game Startup
categoryKeys.guidance: Visas, grants, incubators, publishers.

categoryKeys.name: Pace of Life
categoryKeys.guidance: City vs. regional differences; commute times.

categoryKeys.name: Typical Weekend Schedule (Family of Four)
categoryKeys.guidance: Typical weekend rhythms; opening hours; family activities.

categoryKeys.name: Typical Workday Schedule (Family of Four)
categoryKeys.guidance: Common school/work hours; lunch length; after-school care patterns.

categoryKeys.name: Vacation Days (Minimum)
categoryKeys.guidance: Legal floor incl. public holidays.

categoryKeys.name: Vacation Days (Typical)
categoryKeys.guidance: Common practice for tech roles.

categoryKeys.name: Work Week Hours
categoryKeys.guidance: Statutory vs. typical; overtime norms.

categoryKeys.name: Work-Life Balance
categoryKeys.guidance: Cultural norms; after-hours boundaries.

categoryKeys.name: .NET Work Prospects
categoryKeys.guidance: Market demand; top employers; remote vs. onsite.

categoryKeys.name: Economic Health
categoryKeys.guidance: GDP growth, unemployment, inflation snapshot.

categoryKeys.name: Employer Visa Sponsorship
categoryKeys.guidance: Common/rare; processing reliability.

categoryKeys.name: Minimum Wage
categoryKeys.guidance: National/sectoral; enforcement; living wage comparison.

categoryKeys.name: Remote-Friendly Culture
categoryKeys.guidance: Hybrid norms; coworking; time-zone alignment.

categoryKeys.name: Ruby Work Prospects
categoryKeys.guidance: Market demand; key sectors; frameworks in use.

categoryKeys.name: Typical Software Salaries
categoryKeys.guidance: .NET / Ruby / Game dev ranges; senior vs. mid.

categoryKeys.name: Studio Density
categoryKeys.guidance: Count active game, VFX, and animation studios in the metro, weighting both headcount and project throughput to gauge cluster depth.

categoryKeys.name: Anchor Employers
categoryKeys.guidance: Assess presence of flagship or renowned studios that attract talent, ship globally recognized titles, and provide training pipelines.

categoryKeys.name: Vendor/Outsource Ecosystem
categoryKeys.guidance: Evaluate availability of specialized vendors, co-dev shops, and collectives that absorb overflow or niche production needs.

categoryKeys.name: Education Pipeline Strength
categoryKeys.guidance: Review quality and volume of local degree programs in game development, animation, and interactive media feeding junior talent.

categoryKeys.name: Continuing Education Availability
categoryKeys.guidance: Check for bootcamps, workshops, and short courses that upskill professionals on current engines and tools.

categoryKeys.name: Community Activity
categoryKeys.guidance: Measure cadence of meetups, jams, conferences, and creator gatherings that sustain professional networks.

categoryKeys.name: Hiring Velocity
categoryKeys.guidance: Estimate typical time-to-fill for core game roles in the metro and flag structural hiring bottlenecks.

categoryKeys.name: Compensation Benchmark
categoryKeys.guidance: Track local median total compensation across design, art, engineering, and production roles compared with global peers.

categoryKeys.name: Language
categoryKeys.guidance: Note whether English is the working norm and how language proficiency affects hiring and collaboration.

categoryKeys.name: Remote Expectations
categoryKeys.guidance: Capture prevalence of hybrid/remote arrangements among studios and how they influence relocation needs.

categoryKeys.name: Engine Community Bias
categoryKeys.guidance: Identify whether the local ecosystem leans toward Unreal, Unity, proprietary tech, or other engines and how that shapes tooling expertise.

categoryKeys.name: Real-Time vs Pre-Rendered Focus
categoryKeys.guidance: Clarify whether production favors real-time/interactive pipelines or pre-rendered/cinematic work and the implications for talent.

categoryKeys.name: Demand–Supply Balance
categoryKeys.guidance: Compare open requisitions to available qualified candidates to understand market tightness or slack.

categoryKeys.name: Retention & Churn Risk
categoryKeys.guidance: Assess historical studio stability, layoffs, and attrition trends affecting long-term employment.

categoryKeys.name: Diversity & Inclusion Index
categoryKeys.guidance: Evaluate representation, accessibility, and inclusion initiatives across the regional industry.

categoryKeys.name: Tax Incentives for Games/Creative
categoryKeys.guidance: Document availability, size, and reliability of tax credits, grants, or rebates for game and interactive media production.

categoryKeys.name: Economic/Policy Stability
categoryKeys.guidance: Summarize predictability of regulations, funding programs, and political support impacting the industry.

categoryKeys.name: Founder/Operator Community
categoryKeys.guidance: Gauge density of experienced game founders and operators who provide mentorship and peer support.

categoryKeys.name: Early-Stage Capital Access
categoryKeys.guidance: Assess availability of angels, seed investors, and grant programs willing to back game startups.

categoryKeys.name: Accelerator/Incubator Access
categoryKeys.guidance: Note dedicated or game-friendly accelerator, incubator, or lab programs that provide capital and services.

categoryKeys.name: Senior Talent Availability
categoryKeys.guidance: Evaluate depth of experienced leads across art, engineering, design, and production willing to join startups.

categoryKeys.name: Contractor/Freelancer Bench
categoryKeys.guidance: Track availability of on-demand specialists and contractors to help teams scale quickly.

categoryKeys.name: Hiring Velocity
categoryKeys.guidance: Estimate time-to-fill for generalist and specialist roles within early-stage studios.

categoryKeys.name: Compensation Benchmark
categoryKeys.guidance: Benchmark cash and equity norms for startup-stage roles relative to cost of living.

categoryKeys.name: Language
categoryKeys.guidance: Document English and local language expectations for go-to-market, community, and operations work.

categoryKeys.name: Remote Expectations
categoryKeys.guidance: Describe norms around distributed teams, async workflows, and cross-border collaboration.

categoryKeys.name: Coworking & Startup Infrastructure
categoryKeys.guidance: Review quality and accessibility of coworking, production labs, mocap stages, and maker spaces supporting prototypes.

categoryKeys.name: Legal & IP Support
categoryKeys.guidance: Identify availability of legal counsel versed in game IP, licensing, publishing, and platform agreements.

categoryKeys.name: Publisher/Platform Relationships
categoryKeys.guidance: Assess proximity to publishers, platform BD teams, and support programs for launches.

categoryKeys.name: Market Research & Playtesting
categoryKeys.guidance: Note availability of panels, research vendors, and playtest communities for iterative design.

categoryKeys.name: Government/Startup Visas
categoryKeys.guidance: Summarize ease of securing founder and employee visas or relocation pathways tied to entrepreneurship.

categoryKeys.name: Cost of Doing Business
categoryKeys.guidance: Estimate typical payroll, space, and service costs for an early-stage studio in the metro.
